contents.text: Welcome to Duncan Channon in San Francisco, a two-time Ad Age Small Agency of the Year specializing in bold marketing solutions.
For information on new business opportunities and our marketing services, press 1.
To speak with our new business development team, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our new business development team.

navigationGoals: I need to speak with someone about launching a new marketing campaign
Discuss starting a marketing campaign for my veteran-owned small business
Connect me with your new business team to discuss integrating an API-based marketing automation solution.
I’d like to speak with someone about partnering with your team to advertise my small local bakery.
I’d like to discuss marketing services your agency could provide for promoting my student-run physics research fair.

contents.text: To learn about our creative and branding services, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our creative and branding specialists.

navigationGoals: I’d like details on your creative and branding services for a rebrand
Review creative branding concepts for my nonprofit supporting veterans
I want to brainstorm a dynamic branding architecture for our product design system with your creative specialists.
I need help refreshing the logo and branding for a charity event I’m organizing.
I need branding and creative design support for my university physics club’s new outreach campaign.

contents.text: For existing client support and account inquiries, press 2.
For client services and project updates, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to client services and project support.

navigationGoals: I need a status update on my ongoing project
Get a status update on our ongoing digital ad project
As an existing client, I'd like a status report on our current project's sprint milestones.
I want an update on the marketing materials project we’re currently working on.
I’m calling to get an update on the progress of our ongoing physics department marketing project.

contents.text: For billing and invoice questions, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our billing department.

navigationGoals: I need help resolving a billing issue on my invoice
Clarify a charge on my most recent invoice
I need to audit my latest invoice and verify the billing itemization.
I have a question about the recent bill I received for your services.
I have questions about the invoice we received for the promotional materials created for our physics symposium.
